messages.content:
Dear Resident

People say to me “why should I vote? It won’t make any difference.” Well I can tell you now that your vote in Wyre Forest is absolutely crucial.

Wyre Forest is one of those seats that will determine the outcome of this general election. In order to get rid of Gordon Brown, Conservatives must win 117 seats – to have a majority of just one seat in Westminster. Wyre Forest is number 82 on that list of target seats.

But your vote at this general election isn’t just about change for our country. It’s about the future for Wyre Forest. It’s about dealing with the local issues that are facing us all right now.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Wyre Forest is one of those seats that will determine the outcome of this general election. [...] Wyre Forest is number 82 on that list of target seats.

issues.health: a better deal for Wyre Forest on all our public services – including health
issues.socialWelfare: help get a better deal for pensioners

leaflet.personalStatement: I am passionate about working for Wyre Forest’s future; to deal with the issues that face us all right now – jobs, local businesses, helping families to cope with the recession, helping get a better deal for pensioners, and working for a better deal for Wyre Forest on all our public services – including health.

contactInformation.address: Margaret Thatcher House, 35 Mill Street, Kidderminster, DY11 6XB

images.caption: Mark Garnier posing for the leaflet
